content.body: â€¦I had just expected to find the definitions of those in the WebIDL spec itself, rather than in the HTML spec
How can a worklet have multiple realms? https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/webappapis.html#worklet-agent
Dominic Farolino: iirc each script that you add through addModule or equivalent runs in its own realm
content.formatted_body: Dominic Farolino: iirc each script that you add through addModule or equivalent runs in its own realm

content.body: Dominic Farolino: it's a bit different from `<iframe>` in that the realms cannot access each other directly (though they can prolly observe each other)
content.formatted_body: Dominic Farolino: it's a bit different from <iframe> in that the realms cannot access each other directly (though they can prolly observe each other)
